items.name: Impossible Escape
explicitMods:
Passives in Radius of Ghost Dance can be Allocated
without being connected to your tree
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: She was the last of countless progeny bred to test the limits of limitless power.
In the cosmic prison of her birth, her siblings fought each other to the death
for supremacy. She alone reached her limit... and broke through.

items.name: Unnatural Instinct
implicitMods: Corrupted Blood cannot be inflicted on you
explicitMods: Allocated Small Passive Skills in Radius grant nothing
Grants all bonuses of Unallocated Small Passive Skills in Radius
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: "I don't know how I know,
I just know that I know."

items.name: Forbidden Flesh
explicitMods: Allocates Tukohama, War's Herald if you have the matching modifier on Forbidden Flame
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: The bodies of those wholly subsumed by the Tangle
continue to merge and mutate and cry out for release...

items.name: Watcher's Eye
explicitMods: 6% increased maximum Energy Shield
6% increased maximum Life
6% increased maximum Mana
10% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Fire Damage while affected by Purity of Fire
Unaffected by Burning Ground while affected by Purity of Fire
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: One by one, they stood their ground against a creature
they had no hope of understanding, let alone defeating,
and one by one, they became a part of it.

items.name: Voices
explicitMods: Adds 3 Jewel Socket Passive Skills
Adds 1 Small Passive Skill which grants nothing
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: Only a madman would ignore a god's instructions.

items.name: Thread of Hope
explicitMods: Only affects Passives in Massive Ring
Passives in Radius can be Allocated without being connected to your tree
-10% to all Elemental Resistances
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: Though we cannot touch; one thought, one wish, through centuries alone in darkness.

items.name: Sublime Vision
explicitMods: Auras from your Skills have 40% increased Effect on you
30% of Cold and Lightning Damage taken as Fire Damage while affected by Purity of Fire
Aura Skills other than Purity of Fire are Disabled
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: This world is not good enough for her,
so I will make a better one. Nothing
matters but the pursuit of perfection.

items.name: Forbidden Flame
explicitMods: Allocates Tukohama, War's Herald if you have the matching modifier on Forbidden Flesh
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: The minds of those studied utterly by the Cleansing Fire
continue to think and dream and beg for silence...

items.name: Rational Doctrine
implicitMods: 3% increased Spell Damage while wielding a Staff
0.2% of Spell Damage Leeched as Energy Shield
explicitMods:
You have Consecrated Ground around you while
stationary if Strength is your highest Attribute

25% chance to create Profane Ground on Critical
Strike if Intelligence is your highest Attribute
Effects of Consecrated Ground you create Linger for 4 seconds
Effects of Profane Ground you create Linger for 4 seconds
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: Logic wanes in shining faith, and in rationalism, ardour dims
Thus, the cynic and the zealot are divided
But can they not be one and the same?

items.name: Lethal Pride
explicitMods:
Commanded leadership over 12666 warriors under Rakiata
Passives in radius are Conquered by the Karui
Historic
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: They believed themselves the greatest warriors, but that savagery turned upon their own.

items.name: Warrior's Tale
implicitMods: 21% reduced Effect of Curses on you
explicitMods: 100% increased effect of Tattoos in Radius
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: The story of a life, written in blood and ink.

items.name: Rapture Prism
enchantMods: 2 Added Passive Skills are Jewel Sockets

Added Small Passive Skills grant: Staff Attacks deal 12% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments
Added Small Passive Skills grant: Mace or Sceptre Attacks deal 12% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments
explicitMods: Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +2 to Strength
1 Added Passive Skill is Aggressive Defence
1 Added Passive Skill is Overlord
1 Added Passive Skill is Smite the Weak
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

118.name: Mace and Staff Damage
stats: Staff Attacks deal 12% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments
Mace or Sceptre Attacks deal 12% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments
reminderText: (Warstaves are considered Staves)
(Ailments that deal Damage are Bleeding, Ignited, and Poisoned)

120.name: Overlord
stats: 30% increased Damage with Maces, Sceptres or Staves
Melee Hits with Maces, Sceptres or Staves Fortify for 6 seconds
reminderText: (Warstaves are considered Staves)

123.name: Mace and Staff Damage
stats: Staff Attacks deal 12% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments
Mace or Sceptre Attacks deal 12% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments
reminderText: (Warstaves are considered Staves)
(Ailments that deal Damage are Bleeding, Ignited, and Poisoned)

124.name: Smite the Weak
stats: 40% increased Attack Damage against Maimed Enemies
Attacks have 10% chance to Maim on Hit
reminderText: (Maimed enemies have 30% reduced Movement Speed)

125.name: Mace and Staff Damage
stats: Staff Attacks deal 12% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments
Mace or Sceptre Attacks deal 12% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments
reminderText: (Warstaves are considered Staves)
(Ailments that deal Damage are Bleeding, Ignited, and Poisoned)

128.name: Aggressive Defence
stats: 20% increased Damage with Attack Skills while Fortified
reminderText: (Fortifying grants an amount of Fortification based on the Damage of the Hit)
